title: Coverage and mentions in Estonian media

yaml.title: Coverage and mentions in Estonian media

markdown.markdown:
- Coverage in the Kanal2 TV channel [Reporter evening show](https://reporter.kanal2.ee/7970308/viljandi-opetajad-tutvusid-tehisaruga-mis-laste-eest-koolitood-koik-ara-teeb) from a workshop for the Viljandi Education Foundation
- Coverage in the [Pärnu Postimees](https://parnu.postimees.ee/7947105/parnu-keskraamatukogu-keskendus-sunnipaeval-tehisarule) about a discussion panel at the Pärnu library on AI and authorship
- Public lecture "Dangers and opportunities of generative AI" (in Estonian) via [Postimees TV](https://haridus.postimees.ee/7872884/avalik-loeng-tehisintellekt-kas-karta-voi-kasutada) (recording available at link)
- Interview segment in the ["Evening!"](https://duoplay.ee/5826/ohtu?ep=749) talk show of Kanal 2 
- Opinion piece in ERR [Novaator](https://novaator.err.ee/1609007981/andres-karjus-tehisintellekt-seab-juba-sel-sugisel-koolid-sundvaliku-ette) on how generative AI will affect education and forces all educational instutions to make a choice, sooner or later
- [TÜHI Eeter podcast](https://www.levila.ee/raadio/tuhi-eeter/kumb-on-arukam-kas-inimaru-voi-tehisaru) on AI, education, and being human
- Äripäev radio/podcast [Õppetund](https://www.aripaev.ee/saated/2023/03/30/tehisintellekt-muudab-taiskasvanute-oppimist-ja-opikogemust) on how AI affects the professional training and adult education sector
- Tallinn University + PostimeesTV [Ekspert Eetris](https://haridus.postimees.ee/7722633/ekspert-eetris-andres-karjus-kas-chatgpt-hakkab-mojutama-meie-vaartusi-ja-kaitumist), interview with Andres on AI and ChatGPT in education
- BFM Luna TV [clip](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cXpNkDgfP7Y) on ChatGPT usage among students
- Postimees [interview](https://www.postimees.ee/7717736/tehisintellekti-abil-kodutoo-kirjutajaid-on-pea-voimatu-vahele-votta) with Andres and other experts in AI and education
- News piece in [Pealinn](https://pealinn.ee/2022/09/29/vaata-millised-ettevotjad-saavad-tanavu-tunnustamise-osaliseks-ja-voidavad-auhinna/) on Tallinn city enterpreneurship prizes 2022, including Andres & colleagues for their media monitoring AI prototype in collaboration with AS Ekspress Grupp.

metadata.title: Coverage and mentions in Estonian media
